samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the Vue autocomplete component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to group based on the different categories with individual header and icon support using the Vue autocomplete component.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source and fetch data from remote data service in the Vue autocomplete component.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the Vue autocomplete component pop-up list using template.

samples.name: Highlight
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to highlight the searched characters in the suggested list items of the Vue autocomplete component.

samples.name: Custom Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to achieve the custom filtering functionalities in the Vue autocomplete component.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to achieve the diacritics filter functionalities in the Vue autocomplete component.

samples.name: Two-way-Binding
samples.description: The Vue Autocomplete component supports two-way data binding using the v-model attribute of Vue directive. It helps to achieve in sync with data in the DOM.
